entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain near midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 after midnight. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
